title: A lot of crashing since new GPU & Random moments I can't move in game.
body:
Problem #1

Ever since I got a 1060 6GB Founders Edition my game has been having freezing and crashing issues. Is there any way to fix this? I can't do anything with it cause it happens so often.

----
Problem #2

Also, a completely other problem that I really need help with is resting my controls 100%. At some point I went in to some .ini and changed things up with controls and I think that's starting a problem where I can't move at all but the game is still going.

Please help quick. If this is not allowed here please forward me somewhere I can post this. Thanks.

replies.body:
Freezing and crashing can be caused by a few different things. If you're running Windows 10, this is most likely caused by the Windows Game Bar, which has a *Game DVR* feature that has caused crashes and freezing for some players. I recommend ensuring this feature is disabled by working through [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

As for your input settings reset, you can resolve this by deleting the **input.ini** and **PersistedSettings.json** files from within the **Config** folder while you have the League Client running in the background.

Let me know if you have any questions.
